paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT job, 
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deposit,
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_deposit
FROM bank.train_orc
GROUP BY job
ORDER BY deposit DESC;

msg.data:
job	deposit	no_deposit
management	1301	8157
technician	840	6757
blue-collar	708	9024
admin.	631	4540
retired	516	1748
services	369	3785
student	269	669
unemployed	202	1101
self-employed	187	1392
entrepreneur	123	1364
housemaid	109	1131
unknown	34	254

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT marital, 
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deposit,
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_deposit
FROM bank.train_orc
GROUP BY marital
ORDER BY deposit DESC;

msg.data:
marital	deposit	no_deposit
married	2755	24459
single	1912	10878
divorced	622	4585

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT age, 
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deposit,
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_deposit
FROM bank.train_orc
GROUP BY age
ORDER BY age ASC;

%jdbc(hive)
SELECT education, 
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deposit,
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_deposit
FROM bank.train_orc
GROUP BY education
ORDER BY deposit DESC;

msg.data:
education	deposit	no_deposit
secondary	2450	20752
tertiary	1996	11305
primary	591	6260
unknown	252	1605

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT housing, loan, 
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deposit,
SUM(CASE WHEN term_deposit = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_deposit
FROM bank.train_orc
GROUP BY housing, loan
ORDER BY deposit DESC;

msg.data:
housing	loan	deposit	no_deposit
no	no	3135	14069
yes	no	1670	19093
yes	yes	265	4102
no	yes	219	2658

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
-- '-loss logloss -opt SGD -reg l1'
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.prediction_orc;

%jdbc(hive)
-- '-loss modified_huber -opt AdaDelta -reg l1 -iters 20'
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.prediction2_add_bias_orc;

-- '-loss modified_huber -opt SGD -reg l1 -iters 20'
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.prediction2_add_bias_orc;

-- '-loss squared_hinge -opt SGD -reg l1 -iters 20'
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.prediction2_add_bias_orc;

-- '-loss modified_huber -opt AdaDelta -reg l1 -iters 20'
%jdbc(hive)
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 0 AND probability >= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (term_deposit = 1 AND probability <= 0.5) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.prediction2_add_bias_orc;

%jdbc(hive)
-- '-trees 50 -seed 71 -attrs Q,C,C,C,C,Q,C,C,C,Q,C,Q,Q,Q,Q,C'
SELECT
COUNT(CASE WHEN (actual = 1 AND predicted = 1) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (actual = 0 AND predicted = 0) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS TN,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (actual = 0 AND predicted = 1) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FP,
COUNT(CASE WHEN (actual = 1 AND predicted = 0) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FN
FROM bank.results_rf_orc;
